review: I'm still exploring but I have been enjoying watching music videos on You Tube and to radio stations on I Heart radio.
author: Sharon A. Zink

review: It's amazing I don't have to watch my videos on my Kindle or my computer, I can just lay on my bed and watch my videos on my TV. This is the coolest device yet to come out.
author: kassandra ceballos

review: Love it. Newer releases cost more which I was not aware of. Must get prime!
author: Kaci Mentzee

review: The Fire TV Stick - works.  Period.  We don't do any gaming so we wanted an inexpensive, simple solution for streaming Amazon Prime and Netflicks media - the Fire TV Stickes works well for less money than many other "sticks".
author: Rosie "Rosie"

review: Works great. Very pleased. Will be great for traveling.
author: K. Winslow

review: Excellent reception. Quick and easy setup.
author: S. Jackson "VO Artist"

review: excellent product that is easy to use.
author: James Knaus
